long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This project enhances an avatar system by adding functionality for managing and saving custom outfits. It creates an "Outfits" tab and panel within the interface, allowing users to save, wear, and delete outfits. The script dynamically fetches and displays the user's current avatar items, enabling easy customization. Users can click a button to save their current outfit, which is stored locally for future use. The script also ensures the outfits tab appears only on relevant pages and updates accordingly. This system allows for smooth switching between saved outfits with a clean, user-friendly interface.
